attributes.action: Come to some agreement with Leeds Uniteds over their tax bill
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The loss of Leeds United would have massave impact on the local comunity, from hitting the local economy to getting childeren intrested in sport. Its the opposite to what your hoping to acheive with the olympics. Your willing to pay billions for them but yet you wont come to some agreement over the money owed by Leeds United. 
I must also add that nobody at Leeds United is responsible for that debt. Its also not the fault of the 1 million people of which Leeds United is there local league club
